name: S'Mall Talk
description:
S'Mall Talk puts you in a small-town mini-mall as you go about your daily shopping. The goal is to tick off every item on your list while having to maintain a dialogue with the store's clerk. Knowing how to talk to them is half the battle. Say the right thing and you will earn yourself a handsome discount. But if you offend the shopkeep you may find yourself struggling to afford all the items you need. 

HOW TO START

Unzip S'Mall_Talk.zip

Open Build/MinnHax.exe

HOW TO QUIT

On the main level, press Escape and select "Quit" with E

CONTROLS 

WASD: Move 

E: Select/ Buy 

Q: Return/ Banter 

F: Price 

R: Inspect 

ESC: Pause 

SHIFT: View Shopping List 

We couldn't do everything we wanted in the time we had and the game is a bit unfinished as a result. While not as polished as we wish it could be, we hope you enjoy our little project!
